sentences.en: And the bickering, slothful Congress seemed likely to pass some important legislation quickly.
sentences.cn: 而平时众人眼里总是充斥着争吵和怠惰的议会也将迅速通过一些重要的立法.

sentences.en: As the door turneth upon his hinges, so doth the slothful upon his bed.
sentences.cn: 14门在枢纽转动, 懒惰人在床上也是如此.

sentences.en: He was not slothful: he had been busy all night.
sentences.cn: 他可不懒，昨晚他忙了整整一夜。

sentences.en: I've never been tardy, absent, disobedient, slothful or disrespectful.
sentences.cn: 我从未缓慢, 缺席, 不服从, 懒惰或者不敬.

sentences.en: KJV The desire of the slothful killeth him; for his hands refuse to labour.
sentences.cn: [新译]懒惰人的愿望害死自己, 因为他的手不肯工作.

sentences.en: Lazy , slothful people sow poverty tomorrow.
Let a man who does not wish to become slothful, fall in love.
sentences.cn: 让不愿懒散度日的男人沉醉于爱情吧.

sentences.en: The desire of the slothful killeth him; for his hands refuse to labour.
sentences.cn: 25懒惰人的心愿,将他杀害, 因为他手不肯作工.

sentences.en: The hand of the diligent shall bear rule: but the slothful shall be under tribute.
sentences.cn: 24殷勤人的手必掌权.懒惰的人必服苦.

sentences.en: The hand of the diligent will rule , But the slothful will be under forced labor.
sentences.cn: 24殷勤人的手必掌权;懒惰的人必服苦役.

sentences.en: The long slobbering slothful decline we had been looking forward to was not to be.
sentences.cn: 我们曾经预料的那漫长的、流着口水的、懒散的衰老过程不会再有了.

sentences.en: The slothful man saith , There is a lion without, I shall be slain in the streets.
sentences.cn: 懒惰人说, 外头有狮子, 我在街上,就必被杀.

words.tran_cn: 怠惰，懒惰；[脊椎] 树懒

trans.tran_cn: 懒惰的，懒散的，不活跃的
